content:
San Francisco's downtown area has plenty of great brunch spots with outdoor seating. Here are a few recommendations:

1. Zuni Cafe: A San Francisco institution with a beautiful outdoor patio area. They're known for their brick oven roasted chicken and delicious brunch dishes. (1658 Market St)
2. Foreign Cinema: A unique spot that screens classic films while you dine on their outdoor patio. They have a great brunch menu and a fun atmosphere. (2534 Mission St)
3. Epic Steak: While they're known for their steak, they also have a great brunch menu and a lovely outdoor patio area with views of the city. (369 Grove St)
4. The Plant Cafe: A great spot for outdoor seating with a garden-like atmosphere. They have a healthy and delicious brunch menu with plenty of options. (301 Steuart St)
5. Piperade: A Basque-inspired restaurant with a cozy outdoor patio area. They have a great brunch menu with dishes like tortilla española and croissants. (1015 Battery St)

These are just a few of the many options in the downtown area. I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll find a great spot to enjoy brunch with your friend Emma!
